synopsis.text: The synopses describe a music video for the song "Iroha Matsuri" performed by Japanese singer Miyuki Mori and the Hibari Children Chorus. This video was featured on the NHK television network's "Minna no Uta" music program, which highlights popular songs. The music video was animated by artist Fumio Ooi. While details about the actual content of the video are scarce, we know it brings to life the lyrical song "Iroha Matsuri," allowing audiences to enjoy this popular tune visually through animation. Featuring a performance by established singer Miyuki Mori with a children's chorus, this music video seems to promise delightful and upbeat animated imagery set to an engaging melody. Its broadcast on a well-known music program suggests wide appeal across viewers.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
